sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Summary = () => { const location = useLocation(); const bookingDetails = location.state || {}; return (

Summary

{/* Homestay Details */}

Homestay Details

Name: {bookingDetails.homestayName}

Location: {bookingDetails.location}

{/* Guest Details */}

Guest Details

Name: {bookingDetails.guestName}

Email: {bookingDetails.email}

{/* Stay Details */}

Stay Details

Check-in: {bookingDetails.checkInDate}

Check-out: {bookingDetails.checkOutDate}

Adults: {bookingDetails.adults}

Children: {bookingDetails.children}

Guest Type: {bookingDetails.guestType}

{/* Payment Details */}

Payment Details

ðŸ›ˆ Payments are made directly to the host upon check-in.

Nu.{bookingDetails.pricePerNight} x {bookingDetails.nights} night(s): Nu.{bookingDetails.totalPrice}

Cleaning Fee: Nu.{bookingDetails.cleaningFee}

Occupancy taxes and fees: Nu.{bookingDetails.taxes}

Total: Nu.{bookingDetails.grandTotal}

ðŸ›ˆ If you cancel your stay within 24 hours, no payment is required. Cancellations after 24 hours may incur a fee to compensate the host.
); }; export default Summary;
